headline: CRYSTAL MARK BELT ABRADING SYSTEM
categories.lvl1: Surface Processing Equipment > Other Surface Processing
specstable:
Manufacturer Crystal Mark Inc
Model SWAM C-115
Description Belt Abrading Machine
Accessories

Parts,consumables and service for the Swam C-115
are available from Crystal Mark
Contact #800-659-7926

Other Information

The SWAM C-115 Belt Abrading Machine is a system
for removing oxides and junctions from silicon and germanium slices.
It is also used for texturing, etching, and back-lapping wafers, as well as frosting quartz and glass.

These objectives are accomplished by the
interfacing of four separate components:

1) The SWAM-BLASTER Model C-115 Precision Sandblaster.
2) A reciprocator to move the nozzle back and fore over the belt.
3) A conveyor belt system that transports substrates under the reciprocator nozzle(s).
4) A dust collector to remove spent media from the work area

Dust collection system requirements:
22,650 L/M at 14 cm E.S.P.W.G. at a velocity of 1370 M/M.
Dust collector model DC-100 not included avaiable from Crystal Mark

Power Requirements 115 V 5.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 35.500 in (90.2 cm)
Depth 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Height 56.500 in (143.5 cm)
Weight 332 lb (151 kg)
